[vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1476023831779{margin-top: 80px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”Digital Marketing Consulting Services” font_container=”tag:h1|font_size:40px|text_align:left|line_height:45px” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_column_text el_class=”consultancy-text”]If you want to succeed in today’s market, your brand needs to be on every relevant online platform. More importantly, your brand needs to promote the right way, at the right time, with the right message. Our digital marketing consulting services will help your brand leverage digital content and promote it to all corners of the web.

Our top digital marketing consultants create a universal digital marketing strategy for your business growth which covers each area of your business, including, marketing, sales, business development, public relationship management, and even web development.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”11277″ img_size=”400×400″ alignment=”center”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_column_text]

Our Digital Marketing Consulting Services Include:

1. Online Marketing Strategy:
We design end to end online strategy that will unite your marketing across channels.
2. SEO Consultation:
From technical audits to link outreach at scale, we got you covered by our SEO consultant.
3. Search Engine Marketing:
Improve ROAS by leveraging our Adwords consultant “funnel”, cross-platform approach.
4. Social Media Marketing:
Our social media marketing consultant creates a marketing strategy to improve your brand awareness & sales.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”40px”][vc_separator color=”black”][vc_empty_space height=”40px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Digital Marketing Consultant in Mumbai, India” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:40px|text_align:center|line_height:45px” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_separator color=”black” border_width=”3″ el_width=”10″][vc_empty_space height=”40px”][vc_column_text]If you have a business or you want to create a company brand that will take over the market, you require the best digital marketing services. A specialized Digital Marketing Consultant will help you create brand awareness that outstands the rest of the competitors in the market. And if you are located in Mumbai and want a digital marketing consultant with great results & support, Digital Consulting Pandit will be a great choice for you!! Because it is important to invest in the right Digital Marketing strategies that will allow you to stand out & drive more results.

Our digital marketing consultant services in Mumbai will help your brand to reach out to your potential customers with the top digital marketing channels & result-oriented marketing strategies. Our experts will do it in various phases like Analysis, Strategize, Execute & optimize by coordinating with you or your team to expand your inner technical resources, create great Digital Marketing strategies for improving your business ROI.

Our digital marketing consultant in Mumbai will do 360-degree work by exclusively designing the detailed Digital Marketing strategies model for your business. The digital marketing consulting services will help your business to achieve the desired results with our technical expertise and knowledge of the current market. So take a smart step towards your new business experience & say hello to accelerated business growth today with Digital Consulting Pandit.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”40px”][vc_separator color=”black”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1589286213893{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 50px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”We Work in four Phases” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:40px|text_align:center|line_height:45px” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_separator color=”black” border_width=”3″ el_width=”10″][vc_empty_space height=”40px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

Analyze

We analyze your current market plan. We also check out the current market scenario for your industry. We do a preliminary analysis of your competitors (if required), before drawing a plan. We basically do a detailed audit of your business.
[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

Strategize

A well-planned strategy is built based on this analysis. We work together to build up a strategy to meet your budgets and which is more practical to achieve. During this phase, we also build up a high-level execution plan.
[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

Execute

This is the most important stage in this journey hence we provide guidance for smooth execution. Even though our team is not actually involved in execution we handhold clients as and when they need us.
[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

Improvise

Marketing is a continuous process. While we are in implementation mode, we need to improvise your strategy as per the ever-changing market. We arrange follow up sessions for this purpose.
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_separator][vc_empty_space height=”40px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Topics Covered” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:40px|text_align:center|line_height:45px” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_separator color=”black” border_width=”3″ el_width=”10″][vc_empty_space height=”40px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”10569″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]
  • Facebook/ Instagram
  • LinkedIn
  • Google Ads
  • YouTube
  • Website Consultancy
  • Creative Strategy
[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]
  • SEO
  • Email Marketing
  • Lead Management
  • Google Analytics

  • Media Planning
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”40px”][vc_separator][vc_empty_space height=”40px”][vc_custom_heading text=”FAQs” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:40px|text_align:center|line_height:45px” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_separator color=”black” border_width=”3″ el_width=”10″][vc_empty_space height=”40px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_toggle title=”What is a Digital Marketing Consultancy?” custom_font_container=”tag:h5|text_align:left” custom_use_theme_fonts=”yes” use_custom_heading=”true”]A digital marketing consultancy helps businesses to gain a position in the digital space and offer personalized & professional assessments through a process that includes the evaluation, optimization, and development of solutions in their businesses.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title=”What are the benefits Digital Marketing Consultancy services provide?” custom_font_container=”tag:h5|text_align:left” custom_use_theme_fonts=”yes” use_custom_heading=”true”]A digital marketing consultant creates digital marketing plans, defines the strategies you need to position yourself in the online market to grow, and then execute them and consider the necessary digital channels to communicate them to reach your target audience successfully.[/vc_toggle][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_toggle title=”Why hire a Digital Marketing Consultant?” custom_font_container=”tag:h5|text_align:left” custom_use_theme_fonts=”yes” use_custom_heading=”true”]If you want to implement new projects for your business, streamline its digital capabilities, or take a new initiative to maximize and optimize your performance on online platforms, it’s time for you to recruit Digital Marketing consultancy services. A digital marketing agency will help you systematize ideas and concepts, carry out strategies, and put the different stages of your project into motion from the initial bright idea to its execution.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title=”What Digital Marketing Strategy Services do we offer?” custom_font_container=”tag:h5|text_align:left” custom_use_theme_fonts=”yes” use_custom_heading=”true”]The best Digital marketing strategies involve defining the goals for your business, identifying the key performance indicators (KPIs) to measure the progress, and creating a consistent brand value. Some of the initial steps in the process are developing buyer personas and value propositions for your business.

Next, comes aligning your teams and making sure they work with the action plan for all your Digital Marketing efforts, in terms of content, social media, traffic and lead generation, and conversion. Also, it’s a clearly-defined plan for implementation so that everything is executed on time and within a defined budget. As a digital marketing agency we follow the above outline to generate results for our clients, we know that every business is unique.

Therefore, our team of expert digital marketing strategies will work directly with your company to:

  • Understand business vision and objectives
  • Define both short-term and long-term goals for your business
  • Identify your main target audiences & niche
  • Analyze your business competitors
  • Develop unique and convincing ways to market your brand
  • Show how your financial planning can impact market results
  • Ways to reach out to your targeted audience

[/vc_toggle][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row disable_element=”yes”][vc_column][vc_separator][vc_empty_space height=”40px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row disable_element=”yes”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”How we do it” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:40px|text_align:center|line_height:45px” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_empty_space height=”40px”][vc_column_text]

  1. We will conduct a number of sessions over the course of few months.
  2. Initial sessions will involve Understanding Business and strategy planning.
  3. Analyzing the leads received on a regular basis.
  4. We would be offering recommendations to enhance the conversion of leads through a proper course of action.
  5. Different Digital techniques will be recommended to increase the number of leads through the Digital Platform.
  6. During the execution phase, your team plays a major role however, hand holding is done wherever required.
  7. Limited training along with consultancy will be provided wherever applicable.
  8. The team will be available on phone or email for queries that come up during execution.
